title: Bitten
description: Starving artist and student Julia Thurmond keeps life simple...it's all she can afford to do. Then she meets Nikolai, an exotic foreigner intent on her seduction. His erotic touch melts her defenses, enslaves her to his will. Their love is the most dangerous thing she's ever known but she is quickly learning that Nikolai is not like other men. He's changing... Now she has a monster tied to her bed and there is only one thing she can do to keep him from turning with the full moon. Julia's world is upside down. Everything is changing...and so is she.
author: Sherri L. King
